item.description:
I've been wanting to see this movie for months!
It's playing at the IMAX! This should be awesome. If you've never been to the IMAX you're missing out. HUGE Screen and incredible sound system.
We'll meet at the front entrance at 4:45 and head over to the theater just before 5. The movie starts at 5:15 and runs for just under 2 hours.

______________________________________________________________________________
Revised! After the movie I have a reservation at The British Beer Company for 7:30. Check out their menu by downloading their menu here: http://britishbeer.co...

They're located at :
120 Worcester Rd.
Framingham, MA 01702
Phone number (508)879-1776

This place is ALWAYS packed! I thought it'd be better to go to a place that took reservations than wait for a table for an hour or more at The Cheesecake Factory.
The Cheesecake factory does reservations during the week so keep your eye on the calendar for a weeknight DINNER NIGHT coming soon.
Please Please Please! Buy your tickets in advance on-line at http://www.jordansima...
Select the Natick Theater and make sure you select December 20th at 5:15pm.
______________________________________________________________________________

If you haven't bought your tickets yet DON'T RSVP!
I've set an rsvp limit of 8 people for each group.

If you have any questions call me (508) 212-4111

Mark
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the front entrance just inside the revolving door
item.name: MOVIE NIGHT! Day The Earth Stood Still at the Natick IMAX
